#summary Tutorials: Updating an object without transactions.
#labels Phase-Support

{{{
		SimplePersistent persistentObject = (SimplePersistent) repository.restore("1");
		persistentObject.setValue("First Value");
		
		repository.update(persistentObject);

}}}

 # Restore the object from the repository. 
 # Set any of the object properties to new values. 
 # Update the object in the repository.

The update throws a !PersistentNotFoundException when the updated object does not exist in the repository.

{{{
		try {
			repository.update(persistentObject);
		} catch(PersistentNotFoundException pnfe){
			// Expected when the repository doesn't contain another object 
                        // with the same identity as the persistentObject.
                        ... handling code
		}

}}}

*Note* Update will overwrite the pre-existing object in the repository, regardless it is of the same class or not.
